title: Land for sale at Melder place,Nugegoda
details:
Prime location.Nice block of land..Highly residential area.Private road off Tissa Mawatha, .500 meters to Nugegoda town..700 meters to Lyceum international school. and Anula .All the Banks,hospitals and sales outlets are at close proximity.

Clear Deeds

Genuine Buyers only..no brokers Agents please..

Contact Edi for an appointment.
